### Changed
- Fix CNP issues (allow traffic from pods in kube-system to nginx-ingress-controller)
  - Upgrade `grafana-agent` to 0.4.5.
  - Upgrade `alloy` to 0.3.1.
  - Upgrade `promtail` to 1.5.4.
